markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Quetzalcoatlus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3152)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Quetzalcoatlus are the largest flying members of the pterosaur family and are often mistaken for dragons due to their immense size and 40-foot wingspans. Using the joints of their massive wings as forelimbs, they are also quite capable of moving on land, snatching smaller prey from the ground or out of streams.

 Quetzalcoatlus are carnivorous, feeding on a variety of reptiles, mammals, large fish, amphibians, and other vertebrates. They are not inherently aggressive creatures and are happy to scavenge for food, but when presented with live prey they readily attack almost any creature smaller than themselves.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Quetzalcoatlus.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Quetzalcoatlus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3152)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 278 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +15; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=371)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +14, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +12 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 110

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 15 feet, fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +17 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d8 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +17,
**Damage** 2d8+10 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Carry**   A quetzalcoatlus can [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312) at half Speed while it has a single creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90). Both its talons are occupied while it does this.

**Swoop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The quetzalcoatlus [Flies](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312) up to its Speed and makes one beak or talon Strike at any point during that movement.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-459" />
name: Quetzalcoatlus
